titleInfo.title: Esther Winocur at the 75th Anniversary Celebration of the Jewish Consumptives' Relief Society

physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on envelope: ''#451 JCRS - 75th Anniv, 1979''. On back of photograph: ''#451 AMC Cancer Research Center and Hospital (Jewish Consumptives' Relief Society) 75th Anniversary Se: 1979, Center - Don Strauss, Deena Strauss''.

mods.abstract: 75th Anniversary Celebration of the Jewish Consumptives' Relief Society (JCRS). Left to right: unidentified woman, Don Strauss, Deena Strauss, and Esther Winocur. The JCRS was a sanatorium for tuberculosis patients that was founded in 1904 by a group of immigrant Jewish workingmen along with the support of several leading physicians and rabbis in Denver, Colorado.
mods.note: Accession # 1271, Donated by AMC Cancer Research Center as part of the JCRS Records.

titleInfo.title: Beck Archives Photograph Collection, Health Care and Philanthropy
